actions.name: AddTagsToCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a certificate

actions.name: DeleteCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a certificate and its associated private key

actions.name: DescribeCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to retreive a certificates and its metadata

actions.name: ExportCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to export a private certificate issued by a private certificate authority (CA) for use anywhere

actions.name: GetAccountConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve account level configuration from AWS Certificate Manager

actions.name: GetCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a certificate and certificate chain for a certificate ARN

actions.name: ImportCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to import a 3rd party certificate into AWS Certificate Manager (ACM)

actions.name: ListCertificates
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the certificate ARNs and the domain name for each ARN

actions.name: ListTagsForCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to lists the tags that have been associated with a certificate

actions.name: PutAccountConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update account level configuration in AWS Certificate Manager

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a certificate

actions.name: RenewCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to renew an eligible private certificate

actions.name: RequestCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to requests a public or private certificate

actions.name: ResendValidationEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to resend an email to request domain ownership validation

actions.name: UpdateCertificateOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to update a certificate configuration. Use this to specify whether to opt in to or out of certificate transparency logging
